impossible_to_get_your_home_dir: Impossible to get your home dir!
fail_on_get_your_home_string: Fail on get your home string!
couldnt_parse_the_string_to_date: Couldn't parse the string to date. The format is YYYY-MM-DD
couldnt_parse_the_string_to_money: Couldn't parse the string to money. The format is 00000.00
couldnt_parse_the_string_to_integer: Couldn't parse the string to integer
select_one_input_the_full_uuid_or_search: Select one, input the full uuid or search typing starting with '\'
tags_how_to_use_add:
How to use: bmoney tags add [name]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney tags add -i
tags_how_to_use_update:
How to use: bmoney tags update [id] [name] [value]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney tags update -i
tags_how_to_use_rm: How to use: bmoney tags rm [id]
contacts_how_to_use_add:
How to use: bmoney contacts add [name] [city]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney contacts add -i
contacts_how_to_use_update:
How to use: bmoney contacts update [id] [name|city] [value]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney contacts update -i
contacts_how_to_use_rm: How to use: bmoney contacts rm [id]
accounts_unable_to_set_opening_balance_o: Unable to set opening balance of account
accounts_how_to_use_add:
How to use: bmoney accounts add [name] [bank] [opening balance date] [opening balance] [currency]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney accounts add -i
accounts_how_to_use_update:
How to use: bmoney accounts update [id] [name|bank|obd|ob|curency] [value]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney accounts update -i
accounts_how_to_use_rm: How to use: bmoney accounts rm [id]
rules_unable_to_set_contact: Unable to set contact on rule
rules_how_to_use_add:
How to use: bmoney rules add [term] [new description] [contact] [tags]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney rules add -i
rules_how_to_use_update:
How to use: bmoney rules update [id] [term|description|contact|tags] [value]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney rules update -i
rules_how_to_use_rm: How to use: bmoney rules rm [id]
transactions_lvalue: Value(>= 0 for credit and < 0 for debit)
transactions_how_to_use_add:
How to use: bmoney transactions add [description] [value] [account id] [contact id] [deadline] [paid in](optional) [tags](optional) [observations](optional) [repetitions](optional) [interval in days of repetitions](optional)
Note: For make transfers between accounts you need put the id of destination account on the contact id field instead of the contact id
Or with interactive mode: bmoney transactions add -i
transactions_how_to_use_update:
How to use: bmoney transactions update [id] [description|value|account|contact|deadline|paid|tags|observations] [value]
Or with interactive mode: bmoney transactions update -i
Or for pay mode: bmoney transactions update [id] pay [""|YYYY-MM-DD|unpaid|today](optional) [new_value](optional)
transactions_how_to_use_rm: How to use: bmoney transactions rm [id]
transactions_how_to_use_merge: How to use: bmoney transactions merge [principal transaction id] [secondary transaction id]
transactions_how_to_use_list:
How to use: bmoney transactions list [account id] [from] [to]
Extra arguments:
	--tag=id of your tag, for filter by a specific tag
	-only-forpay, for show only transactions that need to be paid
	--only-paid, for show only paid transactions
	--show-all, for show observations and more columns on registers
transactions_unable_to_set_d: Unable to set D on transaction
transactions_unable_to_set_value: Unable to set value on transaction
transactions_unable_to_set_expected_bala: Unable to set expected balance on transaction
transactions_unable_to_set_balance: Unable to set balance on transaction
transactions_unable_to_set_t: Unable to set T on transaction
transactions_unable_to_set_account: Unable to set account of other transfer on transaction
transactions_unable_to_set_contact: Unable to set contact on transaction
transactions_unable_to_set_total: Unable to set value on total
transactions_ofx_already: Already added in this account with description
transactions_ofx_skip_nomatches: Skiping the transaction without rule matches
transactions_how_to_use_ofx:
How to use: bmoney transactions ofx [account id] /path/to/file.ofx
Extra arguments:
	--auto-skip, for skip already added transactions
	--auto-accept, accept all new transactions without prompt
	--auto-confirm-rules, auto confirm the rule matches
	--auto-skip-nomatches, ignore all transactions without rules for him
transactions_how_to_use_calendar: How to use: bmoney transactions calendar export [account id] [from] [to] > yourfile.ical
transactions_calendar_fail_print: Fail on build the calendar output
